title: Event System: Event Union and Key Events
description: Implement Event union (key, mouse, resize, tick). Key events include: code (KeyCode), modifiers (ctrl, alt, shift). KeyCode covers: char(u21), enter, tab, backtab, backspace, escape, arrows, home/end/page keys, insert, delete, f1-f12.

title: Event System: Mouse Events
description: Implement Mouse struct: x, y position, kind (down, up, drag, move, scroll_up, scroll_down), modifiers (ctrl, alt, shift).

title: Widget: Table
description: Table with optional header, rows, column widths (constraints), selected row, style, header_style, highlight_style.

title: Terminal Backend: Queries
description: Get terminal size (width/height), detect color support (16/256/true color).

title: Integration: rich_zig
description: Integrate with rich_zig: use/re-export Style and Color types, use text spans for styled segments, leverage ANSI rendering for escape sequence generation.

title: App Runtime: Main Loop
description: Implement App.init(config) and App.run(). Main loop: poll event, call update, check action (exit on .quit), call view, render (diff buffer, write changes), repeat until quit.

title: Event System: Modifiers and Size
description: Implement Modifiers packed struct (ctrl, alt, shift as bools). Implement Size struct (width, height for terminal dimensions).

title: Buffer System: Diff
description: Implement buffer diff: CellUpdate struct (x, y, cell), diff algorithm comparing cell-by-cell, optimization to skip unchanged cells for minimal output.

title: Core Types: Style
description: Implement Style struct with fg, bg, bold, italic, underline, dim, blink, reverse, strikethrough. Include Style.patch(other) method and sensible defaults.

title: Widget: Scrollbar
description: Scroll indicator with total items, position, viewport size, style, orientation (vertical/horizontal).

title: Terminal Backend: Output
description: Cursor positioning, clear screen, set fg/bg (16/256/RGB colors), set attributes (bold, italic, etc.), reset attributes. Buffered output with flush for efficiency.

title: Action System: Action Union
description: Implement Action union: none (continue running), quit (exit application), command (execute async command - future feature).

title: Widget: Block
description: Block widget with title, title_alignment, border (none/plain/rounded/double/thick), border_style, and interior style. Render method draws border and title to buffer.

title: Layout System: Constraint Types
description: Implement Constraint union: length(n), min(n), max(n), ratio(num, den), flex(n). These describe how space should be allocated among layout children.

title: Platform Support: Linux and macOS
description: Primary platform support for Linux and macOS with full feature support.

title: Example: List
description: List example: items and selected index state, j/k or arrows for navigation, selection highlight with visual feedback.

title: Core Types: Geometry (Rect, Position)
description: Implement Rect struct (x, y, width, height as u16) with methods: inner(margin), area(), is_empty(), clamp(x, y). Implement Position struct (x, y coordinate pair).

title: Future: Testing Utilities
description: Recording/playback for tests, headless terminal mock, snapshot testing.

title: Terminal Backend: Cleanup
description: Raw mode disable, alternate screen leave, cursor show, mouse disable, bracketed paste disable. Must handle cleanup on panic with registered handler.

title: Widget: Paragraph
description: Multi-line text with wrapping. Options: wrap (none/char/word), alignment, style.

title: Future: Image Support
description: Sixel graphics detection and rendering, Kitty graphics protocol, iTerm2 inline images.

title: Error Handling: Error Types
description: Implement error types: TerminalInitFailed, TerminalQueryFailed, BufferOverflow, InvalidUtf8, IoError, OutOfMemory. Philosophy: all errors explicit, no panics in library code, error unions throughout.

title: Widget: Text
description: Single-line styled text widget with content string, style, and alignment (left/center/right).

title: Example: Tabs
description: Tabs example: tab titles and active index state, number keys or arrows for switching, different content per tab.

title: Integration: Build System
description: Setup build.zig module export, build.zig.zon with rich_zig dependency, example executables (counter, list, tabs, ralph).

title: Widget: Clear
description: Fills area with style (useful before popups). Simple widget for clearing regions.

title: Layout System: Solver
description: Implement layout(area, direction, constraints) function. Must handle: fixed allocation first, then min/max, then ratio, then flex proportionally. Insufficient space: flex shrinks first, then fixed; never negative. Returns slice of Rects matching constraint count.

title: Widget: List
description: Navigable list with items slice, selected index, style, highlight_style, highlight_symbol prefix.

title: Platform Support: Terminal Compatibility
description: Ensure compatibility with major terminals: xterm, GNOME Terminal, iTerm2, Windows Terminal, Alacritty, Kitty.

title: Action System: Command Pattern (Future)
description: Future feature: Command union type, command execution by runtime, results return as events, Command.batch for multiple commands.

title: Layout System: Direction
description: Implement Direction enum: horizontal (split left-to-right), vertical (split top-to-bottom).

title: Future: Scrollable Containers
description: Virtual scrolling for large lists, scroll state management, scrollbar integration.

title: Buffer System: Buffer
description: Implement Buffer struct: width, height, cells array (row-major). Methods: set(x, y, cell), get(x, y), set_string(x, y, str, style) with wide char handling and clipping, fill(area, cell), set_style(area, style).

title: Terminal Backend: Input Parsing
description: Read raw bytes (non-blocking), parse ANSI escape sequences to Event. Handle: arrow keys, function keys, modifiers, mouse X10/SGR, UTF-8 multi-byte, bracketed paste sequences.

title: Buffer System: Cell
description: Implement Cell struct: char (u21), style (Style), width (u8). Defaults: space character, default style, width 1. Support wide characters (width 2 for CJK/emoji).

title: App Runtime: App Generic Struct
description: Implement App(State) type generic over user state type. Fields: state instance, update_fn pointer, view_fn pointer.

title: Future: Mouse Support
description: Clickable regions, drag selection, scroll wheel handling, hover detection.

title: Frame System: Widget Interface
description: Define widget render signature: fn render(self, area: Rect, buf: *Buffer) void. Frame.render uses duck typing to accept any type with render method. No widget base class - composition via functions.

title: Platform Support: Windows
description: Secondary platform: Windows support via Windows Console API or ConPTY. Detect Windows Terminal vs legacy cmd.

title: Future: Animation Helpers
description: Easing functions, duration tracking, frame interpolation for smooth animations.

title: Example: Ralph (Reference App)
description: Full reference application with: agent list, agent detail panel, scrollable log panel, status bar, progress gauges, focus management between panels.

title: Example: Counter
description: Minimal counter example: single counter value state, key handling (q=quit, up/down=increment/decrement), simple view with Block and counter display.

title: Widget: Gauge
description: Progress bar with ratio (0.0-1.0), optional label, style for unfilled, gauge_style for filled portion.

title: Core Types: Color
description: Implement Color union: default, basic 8 colors, bright variants (8), indexed(u8) for 256-color, rgb(r,g,b) for true color.

title: Frame System: Frame Struct and Methods
description: Implement Frame generic over max_widgets with comptime-sized layout cache. Fields: buffer reference, size_ (full terminal area). Methods: size(), layout(area, direction, constraints), render(widget, area).

title: App Runtime: Configuration
description: App configuration options: tick_rate_ms (0=disabled), mouse_capture, paste_bracket, alternate_screen.

title: Terminal Backend: Initialization
description: Raw mode enable, alternate screen enter, cursor hide, mouse enable (optional), bracketed paste enable (optional).

title: Future: Text Input Widget
description: Single-line input, cursor movement, selection, clipboard integration.

title: Widget: Tabs
description: Tab bar with titles slice, selected index, style, highlight_style, divider string between tabs.
